[Template Title]
Engaging LinkedIn Comment Template

[Template Description]
This template generates a personalized comment for LinkedIn posts, specifically designed to congratulate someone on a professional achievement. It incorporates psychological principles to create an authentic and engaging message.

[Template Instructions]
1. Replace [Recipient's Name] with the name of the person you're congratulating.
2. Replace [Specific Achievement] with the specific achievement or event you're congratulating them on.
3. Replace [Shared Interest or Connection] with a shared interest or connection you have with the recipient.
4. Replace [Your Job Title/Field] with your current job title or field of study.
5. Replace [Industry/Field] with the industry or field relevant to the recipient's achievement.
6. Replace [Area Where You Can Provide Value] with an area where you can offer insights or assistance to the recipient.
7. Personalize the message further as needed to reflect your genuine admiration and the unique context of the recipient's achievement.
8. Set [TARGETLANGUAGE] to the language in which you want the comment to be generated.
9. Insert your personalized message into [PROMPT] to generate the final comment.
